appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

appetizers.name: Calamari
appetizers.description: Crispy fried squid with marinara sauce and lemon.

entrees.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
entrees.description: Homemade meatballs in tomato sauce served over spaghetti.

entrees.name: Chicken Parmesan
entrees.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and parmesan cheese.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: Layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream dusted with cocoa powder.

desserts.name: Cannoli
desserts.description: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta cheese and chocolate chips.
